text: Sutaram tomara taderake hatya karani baram allaha'i taderake hatya karechena [1]. Ara apani yakhana niksepa karechilena takhana apani niksepa karenani baram allah‌i niksepa karechilena [2] ebam eta muminaderake allah‌ra paksa theke uttamarupe pariksara (madhyame ucca maryadara asina karara) jan'ya [3]; niscaya allah‌ sarbasrota, sarbajna
